home.name: Tomasz Skorupski
home.lead:
Here is the English translation:

I am an IT specialist with a broad range of experience across Windows/AD and Linux administration, networking, and databases‚Äîadept at combining diverse technologies into practical solutions. I have worked on infrastructure modernization and process improvements, ensuring system stability and user comfort. Currently, I am intensively developing my IT competencies, focusing on modern tools and best practices. I am implementing my own projects using Git, Docker, and learning the fundamentals of CI/CD.

My strengths include quickly adapting to new technologies, strong communication skills, attention to documentation, and a continuous desire to learn. I am open to remote roles that will allow me to grow further, particularly in system administration, technical support, or related areas. I am looking for a place where I can contribute value from day one while simultaneously developing my skills.
home.caption: Stability ‚Ä¢ Automation ‚Ä¢ Security

about.title: About me
about.p1: Hi! My name is Tomasz Skorupski. Since 2018 I have been working in IT - from helpdesk, through system and network administration, to platform and tool development. I combine Windows Server (AD, GPO), Linux/Bash, networks TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VPN and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server) with React/JavaScript development and DevOps tooling (Git, Docker, CI/CD).
about.p2: I‚Äôve just finished my first longer break in a while and I‚Äôm actively seeking a role aligned with my skills and previous experience. My goal is to grow into a Junior DevOps Engineer / Cloud SysAdmin. In parallel, I‚Äôm building my own application, developing hands-on skills in automation, containerization and CI/CD best practices.
about.p3: Previously, I was responsible for support, environment stability, modernization and improvements as an IT Administrator & Developer Platform at Streetcom.
bullets: I design and improve processes, automating repetitive tasks.
I care about reliability, security and transparency of systems.
I communicate clearly ‚Äì bridging business needs with technology.

facts.statusValue: Actively seeking Junior DevOps / Cloud SysAdmin role

Contributed to automation and process-optimization initiatives.
Implementation and integration of secure print systems, full technical customer support.
Network infrastructure optimization and environment stability improvements.
Central monitoring of clients‚Äô printing devices.
Systems and network administration, new tech rollouts, infrastructure modernization.
Building a new server room from scratch, network hardware setup and configuration.
Ensuring smooth operation of end‚Äëuser applications.
Configuration and supervision of IT systems, network infrastructure administration.
User support and incident resolution.
Ensuring high availability of systems.
IT support for retail: service tickets, diagnostics and repair of POS equipment.
Network and device configuration, IT assets inventory.
Fiscal devices service - solving diverse issues across many locations.
Service and configuration of printing devices, user hardware support in bank branches.
On‚Äësite diagnostics and work continuity restoration.
Preparing, configuring and deploying new equipment in the field.

Handling tickets: diagnostics, incident resolution, escalation.
Configurations and changes: workstations, medical apps, permissions.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitleHtml: My public portfolio is modest for now, as most of my past work was done for employers and cannot be shared openly. In parallel, I‚Äôm building a series of demo projects - new items will appear here soon. I publish everything, including smaller and experimental works, on <link>GitHub</link>.

mobiSalon.title: MobiSalon - one‚Äëpage website with CMS
mobiSalon.subtitle: Marketing site for a grooming salon with News and availability admin panel
mobiSalon.description: A lightweight single‚Äëpage website serving as the salon‚Äôs online presence and communications hub. I integrated an admin panel (Decap CMS) that lets the owner publish News posts and mark availability dates without developer support. The layout is fully responsive.

ksefMaster.title: KSeF Master - accounting tool (in development)
ksefMaster.subtitle: KSeF integration: fetch and create invoices
ksefMaster.description: A browser‚Äëbased app to support e‚Äëinvoicing workflows. Phase one covers fetching and creating invoices via the official KSeF API. KSeF progress is slowed by its complexity, difficult API, and constant changes. Due to this, I shifted priority to another project. I am currently building the backend on a separate server at a slow pace.

pwaCookbook.title: Mobile Cookbook (PWA)
pwaCookbook.subtitle: Progressive Web App - diploma project
pwaCookbook.description: I built a progressive web app (PWA) that helps plan meals based on ingredients available at home. It integrates a recipe database, preparation steps and side‚Äëdish cooking times, while a built‚Äëin timer with sound notification helps control the process. Designed mobile‚Äëfirst, it also works offline and is accessible on any device with a browser. It truly shortens time spent cooking and helps decide ‚Äúwhat to cook.‚Äù Built with React, focusing on performance and UX, as part of my diploma work.

animalsOnePage.title: Interesting Animals - One Page
animalsOnePage.subtitle: Simple One Page website (student project)
animalsOnePage.description: A very simple, static one‚Äëpage website created during studies as part of an assignment. It presents selected, interesting animal species in short sections - with basic info and curiosities. I treat it as a small supplementary piece showing consistency in documenting progress. I‚Äôm aware it doesn‚Äôt represent my current skills and I‚Äôll replace it with newer, original projects soon.
